wikipedia_page.main: Brigadier Dame Cecilie Monica Golding,  (née Johnson; 6 August 1902 – 6 June 1997) was a British Army nurse and nursing administrator who rose to Colonel Commandant, Matron-in-Chief and Director of the Queen Alexandra's Royal Army Nursing Corps (QARANC).

link_mentions.page: Queen Alexandra's Royal Army Nursing Corps
List of Dames Commander of the Order of the British Empire
response: *1958: Mary Henrietta Barnett, The Baroness Elliot of Harwood, Monica Golding, Mary Kingsmill Jones, Rose Macaulay, The Duchess of Portland, Maggie Teyte, Alice Mary Williamson
*Monica Golding, 94, British Army nurse and nursing administrator.
* Brigadier Dame Cecilie Monica Golding, DBE (1902–1997) Army nurse, who rose to Colonel Commandant Queen Alexandra's Royal Army Nursing Corps
